summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 26, C. D. Boren's Addition to the City of Seattle, by paving with brick, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 49181, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
